label.phrase: i met him once and he was very kind to me i never got a chance to tell him what i thought that he was my hero

clusterList.phrase: i met him once and he was very kind to me i never got a chance to tell him what i thought that he was my hero
he still comes after me in my dreams
he came back to me and said i'm a guy that's really got to be involved
he always used to tell me
he was very nice every time i had conversations with him
he doesn't seem to have anything positive to say about me does he
he i guess saw something in me and really has never given up on me through good times and bad
it's a misconception that i got old or that i took him lightly
the first time we met his head was always turned away from me
and i asked him what was going on what did i do
oh well that's no good have you told him how you feel
but i have gone over in my mind the two conversations we had and he certainly did not betray to me any impression that he was anything other than tired
he cherished our love he helped make me the woman i am today john is going to be an amazing man for someone but i know that i was supposed to be with someone else
he was behind me and supporting me the whole time
well it seems that you got to him at a very opportune moment
i don't remember anything i don't remember this happening to me i don't know why he'd ever dream of hurting me

i knew at that moment that he'd found someone else and i was not going to cope with it very well so i ran straight back to the magic store and told the old lizard everything that lizard was such a good friend he always listened to me he told me that if ever i needed someone to talk to i could just go to him he lived in the shop so he'd be there at any time and i'm glad he was i went to visit him every day sometimes with a problem and sometimes without he became more of a father to me than my real dad and i was never going to call this new female lizard my mother not in a million years
he really loved you you know
no i don't but i do know that nothing he has ever done could deserve the way you treat him no one deserves you
i told him to forget that nature stuff drop me off at the shopping mall
if he doesn't remember you he'll look at you weird
it takes him a while for him to remember you
man he believed me and then i recieve an sms on my phone for get well soon
i asked him what happened he said my dad clobbered me
but despite not always understanding my dad or agreeing with him i love him
